sentences.en: 'The vinegar sets the indigo and keeps it from fading,' he says.
sentences.cn: 他说，醋可以使靛蓝变稳定，防止牛仔裤褪色。

sentences.en: A great many stars were shining in the indigo blue sky.
sentences.cn: 繁星在靛蓝色的天空闪烁着.

sentences.en: Absorptive aqueous of indigo by activated carbon fiber ( ACF ) was studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了活性炭纤维 ( ACF ) 对水中靛蓝的吸附试验.

sentences.en: AIM : To apply the natural fermentation technology to produce indigo.
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究青黛炮制中的微生物发酵工艺.

sentences.en: Blue from indigo plant is deeper than its origin.
Favourites include Shawn Colvin, the Indigo Girls and Tori Amos.
sentences.cn: 他最喜欢的歌手包括肖恩·科尔文, 蓝色少女合”吕团和多莉·艾莫丝.

sentences.en: He slipped into an indigo tank.

sentences.cn: 她的前额纹着靛青色的刺青。

sentences.en: My research activity has brought me into contact with such Indigo Children.
sentences.cn: 我的研究带领我去接触那些蓝血儿童.

sentences.en: Plantations in Maryland, Virginia and the Carolinas grow staple crops of tobacco, rice and indigo.
sentences.cn: 马里兰 、 弗吉尼亚和卡罗来纳的种植园盛产烟草 、 大米和靛蓝类染料.

sentences.en: Red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo and violet. Mom : It's wonderful !
sentences.cn: 红色, 橙色, 黄色, 绿色, 蓝色, 青色 还有紫色.

sentences.en: The indigo plant or the blue dye obtained from it.
sentences.cn: 假蓝靛靛蓝植物或从这种植物中提取的蓝色染料.

sentences.en: The indigo plant was highly valued until the discovery of chemical dyes in the 19th century.
sentences.cn: 植物靛蓝在当时的欧洲非常昂贵，直到19世纪化学染料的出现。

sentences.en: The sky was indigo blue, and a great many stars were shining.
sentences.cn: 天空一片深蓝, 闪烁着点点繁星.

sentences.en: They are, apparently, difficult for beings of the Indigo Child formation.
sentences.cn: 显然, 这些靛蓝孩童的形成是很困难的.

sentences.en: We transmit herewith an order for 2,500 Lbs . Bengal Indigo . Please find.
sentences.cn: 兹随函寄上深蓝色染料2,500磅的订单一份,请查收.

sentences.en: We transmit herewith an order for 2,500 lbs. bengal indigo.
sentences.cn: 兹随函寄上深蓝色染料2,500磅的订单一份, 请查收.
